rows.label: qst104209_msg0001
rows.name: Oh, hello again~!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0002
rows.name:
You must hear this! My book
was a smashing success~!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0011
rows.name:
To boost sales for my flower
encyclopedia, I released a companion
book. As for the contents, well...

rows.label: qst104209_msg0012
rows.name:
I added a story featuring beautiful
women inspired by flowers~!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0013
rows.name:
It became a huge hit with
male readers. It's been
reprinted over and over!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0021
rows.name:
A magnificent tale featuring many
handsome gentlemen and the wonderful
adventures they share...

rows.label: qst104209_msg0022
rows.name:
After depicting a passionate and
aesthetic story, it became a massive
hit with the female readership~!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0031
rows.name:
People have started asking
me for a new work, but...

rows.label: qst104209_msg0032
rows.name:
Right now, I want to teach
others the many emotions one
can get from literature~!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0033
rows.name:
You're recruiting a language
teacher in Iyasaki Village?
That sounds wonderful~!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0034
rows.name:
It's so important to be
immersed in beautiful
writing from a young age~!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0035
rows.name:
I hope to raise students who
can fall in love with the
characters in a story~!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0036
rows.name:
Are you truly sure you
want me as a teacher?

rows.label: qst104209_msg0051
rows.name: Invite Mesulia to be a teacher?

rows.label: qst104209_msg0052
rows.name: Invite

rows.label: qst104209_msg0053
rows.name: Think it over

rows.label: qst104209_msg0061
rows.name:
Very well! I'll do my best
to teach them well~!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0062
rows.name:
Well then, strike while
the iron is hot! I shall
return home to prepare!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0063
rows.name:
I'll be selecting the best
books to use as textbooks,
so I may be a little late~!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0081
rows.name:
Is that so... If you don't find anyone
else, please invite me again~!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0101
rows.name:
Are you here about the
language teacher position?

rows.label: qst104209_msg0201
rows.name:
Here about the teacher
position? Oh, it's been
decided? Congratulations~!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0301
rows.name:
The pressure to write something
that surpasses my last work is so
great... my pen simply won't move.
